thread.section_title: Science News and Analysis - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: Stock Rally on Softer Dollar Loses Luster

author: Mike Bird
title: Stock Rally on Softer Dollar Loses Luster

organizations.name: stock rally on softer dollar loses luster global

text:
U.S. stocks wobbled around the flatline Friday but headed toward weekly gains, as bets that inflationary pressures remain muted helped push investors back into the market.
The Dow Jones Industrial Average rose 27 points, or 0.1%, to 24766, taking its gains for the week to more than 2%. The S&P 500 fell less than 0.1% while the Nasdaq Composite edged down 0.3%.
Stocks...
